intension: Create a coupon for a hotel reservation offer with a cozy and comfortable interior design. The voucher number is 9878506 and the discount value is $90. The offer is valid until April 20th.
globalcaption: The image features a cozy bedroom with a large bed occupying most of the space. The bed is covered with a white comforter and a grey blanket, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The room also has a chair placed near the bed, adding to the overall comfort.\n\nIn the foreground, there is a sign with a discount offer, likely advertising the bed and breakfast. The sign is placed in the lower left corner of the image, drawing attention to the special promotion.
keywords: voucher, discount, offer, coupon, hotel, reservation, room, service, interior, design, bed, modern, comfortable, cozy, white, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a cozy bedroom with a large bed occupying most of the space. The bed is covered with a white comforter and a grey blanket, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. There are two pillows on the bed, one on the left side and the other on the right side.\n\nIn the room, there is a chair positioned near the bed, and a clock is placed on the wall. The overall setting is further enhanced by the presence of a window, which allows natural light to enter the room
